entries.headline: Secret gardens & model pruning
entries.blurb: Added support for hidden models in the registry and tidied up the Claude integrations. Sometimes the rarest blooms are the ones tucked away.

entries.headline: Polly gets a brain upgrade
entries.blurb: Our resident AI, Polly, now uses OpenAI embeddings and smarter indexing. She's buzzing faster and finding the right nectar with way less effort.

entries.headline: Simplified the honey pot
entries.blurb: Streamlined how we deduct pollen credits into a single, reliable flow. The bees' accountant is much happier with this cleaner math.

entries.headline: Visualizing the hive
entries.blurb: Shipped shiny new dashboards to track daily spending and platform load. It's mesmerizing to watch the colony at work in real-time.

entries.headline: Polly speaks clearer
entries.blurb: Tuned up Polly's system prompt for snappier answers and gave her the power of auto-deployment. They grow up so fast!
